MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL22 postcode area of Abergele affecting a number of properties in the local area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:30am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:25am on the 24th March 2021.
